Subject: Attacking Drillbit
References: <39A31765.1A230FA8@...>

MIME-Version: 1.0

From: TrikeJacob@...

The four maximal dinobots were positioned in different places in Predacon territory.They were spying on the Predacons. Triceradon was positioned near the Predacon base, when he saw Drillbit talking into his com. 

Triceradon burst out of his hiding place. He lowered his horns and charged right towards Drillbit.
 "Die Predacon scum!!" He yells.
nbwrpg@egroups.com wrote:
>
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit arrives at the base.
> "DrillBit, terrorize." He transformed, and put Land Mine in a CR pool.
> He put the terminated body nexed to it, hoping someone would find it.
> He then ran out of the base, and opened a comm.
> "KitKat. Time Bomb is dead. Land Mine is in a CR. Where are you?" He
> askes.
>
